title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: South Park Elementary School Gym, day. Stan is seated on a stool none too pleased before a backdrop of a meadow. Behind the photographer are the kindergartners and Mr. Adler's class

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, now lift your chin a little. Look right here. Right here.  Hey, where's my smile? Come on, I bet you got a smile for me. I-I'm startin' to see a smile. There it is.  Okay great next.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I didn't smile.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I hate picture day at school! It's always some gay-ass photographer with some gay-ass backdrop of New England!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ah, hang on a second. My mom said to make sure I look good this time in... the school pictures.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, smile  Okay, next?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Did you go yet?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: No. This is taking forever.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You guys! You guys! This is sooo funny!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: What, Cartman?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dude, check it out: for picture day, Kenny got into hiis parka backwards, so that his ass shows through his hood. Look! . Kenny, Kenny, over here!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: It isn't that funny, Cartman.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes it is!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Next in line! Come on, let's keep it moving, kids!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Don't listen to that Jew, Kenny, it's totally funny.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Take off your hat, please?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: But I never take off my hat.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Come on now, I bet your parents want a picture of YOU lookin' natural.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: This is how I look natural.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Kyle, we're taking pictures without hats today!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Crap!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Snile! Come on, where's that smile? Is it gonna kill you to smile? I see a smile.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Gayass!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Very nice. Okay, last one?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Uh oh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, have a seat, young man.  Well, okay, lookin' great.Now where's that smile? Come on, give me a nice, wide smile. Wider. Perfect!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Huh, how long 'til we get the pictures back?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Should be about four days.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Four days?? Oh man, I can't wait that long!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: South Park Elementary, four days later, day. Inside, in Ms. Choksondik's class, Cartman is fidgeting rather loudly in his desk

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Heh, c'mon! C'mon c'mon c'mon c'mon! C'mon c'mon! C'mon c'mon c'mon!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Alright, class, I have your school photos to hand out-

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: YES! YES!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Most of them are very nice. But, apparently, one of you thinks it's fun to spoil their school pictures , and thinks he's a comedian. That person will be spending the afternoon in the principal's office!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: :	(Aww, that's bullshit!)

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: School photos aren't for joking around, so you aren't getting your photo back, Butters!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Um-me?? Huh but I didn't do nothin'.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: For the rest of you, I think your pictures turned out very nicely.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: But, buut, but but what hey! Wait a minute!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Let me see!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Bu-but Teacher, I didn't mean to look stupid in my picture. Honest!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dude, dude! Check it out! This is the sweetest thing I've ever done!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: (You've ever done?!)

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Look at how the crap ...is sittin' right in the middle!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Eric, calm down. I'm trying to yell at Butters!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, hokay, I'm sorry Ms. Chokesonrocks!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You know very well my name isn't Chokesonrocks, it's Choksondik! Say it right or you can go to the principal's with Butters!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I'm sorry Ms. Choksondik.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I tried to make a good picture. Honest.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Your mother is waiting for you in the principal's office.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: My mom?  Oh, sweet Jesus!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hoh, Oh my God! More people have to see this picture, you guys. I'm gonna put it on the Internet or... No, wait! Kenny.  I just had the greatest idea... ever!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dairy Gold Milk Company, day. A receptionist in blue suit sits at her desk. The doors open and Cartman enters

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Welcome to South Park Milk Company. Can I help you?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, yes, hello. I am helping out a family who has a missing child, and I was wondering if you could print his photo on your milk carton?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, of course. Printing those photos on our milk really does help. Do you have the photo with you?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes, I have it right hmya.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: O-okay, great. We'll print it immediately.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You will?  Ah.  Oh, ah, thank you for your help.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Sure. If I could get a description of the child to pring underneath the photo?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, yehes. Uh-heh. He has ah, blond hair, aha-and, ah, and a brown eye. Brown eye!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, brown eye...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: And, and big rosy cheeks!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Full cheeks...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Full cheeks!  Winking brown eye, brown eye winking!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Stan's house, day. A TV is heard.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ms. Hamilton was the fourth person to be run over by a motorcycle this week, leaving a city to ponder, who will be next?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hello?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You guys! You guys! You guys!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hello?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...You guys!...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Cartman?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: What's he want?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I don't know. Let's go see.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Cartman's house, minutes later. Cartman can be heard laughing inside as Stan and Kyle approach his door. Kyle rings the doorbell and Cartman answers, still laughing.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Why'd you call us?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Come on. Come on.  Come on. Oho, this is so sweet!  You guys, seriously, this is sooo sweet!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Goddamnit Cartman, what?!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...You put Kenny's pictuer on a milk carton??

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Look at, look at the description. Brown eye!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: That isn't funny, Cartman.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, it's soo completely funny!! Ahaha this is certainly funny!!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: No it's not, Cartman. You know, there really are couples out there who are missing children.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: No there aren't. Jesus, grow up, you guys.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: A house in Wisconsin. A woman enters her kitchen with some groceries and sets them on the kitchen counter next to the sink. She pulls them out one by one, but stops when she pulls out the milk carton.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh my God. Oh my God!  Steven! Steven, come quick!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: What is it, Martha?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Look. It's him! It's... our son.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Our ssson!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dairy Gold Milk Company, day, a few days later. The Wisconsin couple are at the Dairy Gold Milk Company, talking to the receptionist. Their "s" and sometimes "th" comes out sounding like a raspberry

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...and so that's when I called out to my husband. I just knew the boy picture on your milk carton was our little Tommy.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ... yes, I see.  Uh, but the child on the milk carton was reported missing, not found.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: We realize that. But we just thought that maybe someone else had found Tommy, and then lost him again. We're pretty certain that it's our boy, considering his physical appearance. Martha and I have the... same condition.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Riiight.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You may not have realized this, but we actually have buttocks where our heads should be.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Really?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Steven and I have a comdition called "torsonic polarity symdrome." It's a birth defect that's passed on genetically.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Over eleven people worldwide suffer from TPS

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hmm, hmm, that's am-, that's amazing.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Martha and I were lucky enough to meet each other at a TPS convention in France.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: So... do you have heads down where your rear ends should be?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: No no, don't be silly. You see, with TPS, the birth defect is on the exterior only. Behind this we still have all our vital head organs - tongue, eyes, nasal passages...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, Mr. and Mrs...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Uh, Thompssson.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Thompson. Uh, I'll contact the young boy who gave me the photo, and perhaps we can all visit him together.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, wonderful! Steven, we're goin' to see Tommy again!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Now, Martha, what did I say about getting our hopesss up?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You're right. You're right.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Cartman's house, moments later. Cartman is laughing his ass off on the sofa when Stan and Kyle return to see him.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Okay Cartman, what do you want this time?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oho, you guys, you guys! Oh my God. Okay, okay, so get this, get this: The milk company calls me, right?  And they call me and say that two people from Wisconsin... saw the picture of Kenny on the milk carton, and they think it's their kid.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Dude, that's not funny if they're missing their son.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: No, nonono! Because apparently these two people... also kind of look like they have butts where their heads should be!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...Nuh uh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh yes! And the best part is... they're coming here, to my house. And it's gonna be sooo funny!!  Oh Jesus, that's probably them now! Okay, you guys, just play it cool, just play it-, just-sshh. No, sshh, you guys, sshh.  Just- okay  No. Okay, okay, no, you guys, sh, sh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hello, we're Mr. and Mrs. Thompson.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh God.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hohly crahap, duhude, heh!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: No way!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: We understand you've seen our son.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh my... God.

text: Uh, excuse me, boys, do you know anything about this?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Uh

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh boy.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Eh-heh. L-look, if you want an explanation, you yuhou'd better go to Kenny's house.

text: Yeah. He lives about four houses away in the bad side of tahown.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh thank you. Thank you!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Let's hurry!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Cartman's room, moments later. Cartman is at a loss for words and looks scared. The door opens and Kyle and Stan walk in.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ehheh, Cartman, what the hell are you doing?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yeah, you missed them turning around.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You guys, something's wrong.

text: What?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I think... I.. just.. saw the funniest thing I'll ever see. And I... think... I... blew a funny fuse.

text: Blew a funny fuse?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: It was just too much and my sense of humor overloaded.  I don't think anything will ever be funny again. Oh God. What have I got?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You mean they both have butts instead of heads?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yeah, dude, we'll show you. They're over at Kenny's.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: How do they eat?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: How the hell should we know?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: :	Butters! Hey Butters! You have to check this out!

text: W-what?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You gotta come to Kenny's house with us.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: There's these two people with asses where their heads should be.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ahah-I can't, fellas. Ah-I'm grounded for lookin' stupid in my school picture.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: But dude, you gotta see it; it's hysterical!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Butters can't come out and play, boys. He thinks it's funny to look like a jackass in his school pictures that I have to pay for!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Huh, but I told you mom: ah-I didn't mean to look... like a jackass, eh. It just happened.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You made a goofy face!

text: No! That's just what I look like. See?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Fine Butters! If you don't wanna stop making that stupid face at me, you can just stay in your room for another week!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Another week?  I hate my stupid face.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Mr. Mackey's office, day. Cartman is on the couch laying on his back...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay Eric, as your counselor, uh I want you to feel comfortable talking about anything, m'kay?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Mr. Mackey, is it possible that you can see something so funny that it ruins your sense of humor forever?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, I can't think of anything that would be THAT funny.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Two people with asses for heads. Ever since I saw them I can't laugh at anything.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, I see, well... Well, what did you used to think was funny?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: You know, all the usual stuff. Dirty jokes, funny movies, seeing someone die... This morning, I even saw a little girl get her fingers caught in a car poicture and... I couldn't laugh. I mean I... I knew it was funny, but I couldn't laugh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well Eric, I suppose that, just like everything else, laughter can be relative - in, in other words, sometimes people see somethin' so scary that nothin' else scares them, so, the same could be true for funny things.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: So does that mean I'll never laugh again?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: It's possible, hm'kay?  But you know, if you have completely lost your sense of humor, you can always become a writer for the show, "Friends" .Ohokahay, huhuh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ugh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: The McCormick house, later. The Thompsons' car is parked outside, on the street. Inside, the McCormicks, the Thompsons and the receptionist are seated around the coffee table. A brick has replaced two of its legs. Kenny stands beside his mother.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...and so you see, our son was just playing a joke and the little fat kid put it on the carton.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes. Yes, I see.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Kenny, don't you think you owe the Thompsons an apology?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: ...No, it was foolish for us to get our hopes up.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: It was just such a coincidence, considering the photo. You may not have realized this, but Martha and I have buttocks where our heads should be.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Really?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Mr. and Mrs. Thompson, how long has it been since you've seen your son?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Tommy disappeared when he was only seven.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, Steven, it's like it's all happening all over again.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: There there now.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Please, Mrs. Thompson, it'll be alright. Listen, the South Park Dairy Company is the country's largest. We find lost children all the time.  We can help you find Tommy with the company's database!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes, well, aaah-I'll help you find your son. Just stop cryin', Please, for the love of God, stop cryin'!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ah, agh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Mr. Thompson, how did your son become missing? Was he abducted?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes. He was in the care of our nanny at the time.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: The nanny that we trusted so much took off with him and we still don't know why.  We think perhaps she wanted a child of her own.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: And this was back in Wisconsin?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes, but we last heard the nanny was heading west.  That's why we thought Colorado made sssssense.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: We've tried every avenue to find him, but, we've never tried the milk company.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well you just give us a try. I think you'll find that South Park Milk  is not only the best resource for finding kids,  but also the best producer of the freshest 2% lowfat milk the world can offer.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Thank you. Thank you so much for helping us.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: This certainly is a friendly town. You've all been sssssso wonderful.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes, I'm so grateful I just wanna cry again.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: The Bijou Theater, day. "Grossout Comedy 8" is playing there. Inside, Cartman sits amid a bunch of older folk

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dude, why are you wearing Shalayna's panties?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I have to wear Shalayna's panties. Lisa's were in the wash.  Look, can we just get this over with?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: But dude, I can't French-kiss him. He's my grandpa!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Come on, dude.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, alright Here it goes. Come'ere, Grandpa.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Aww

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, dude, oh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dude, what's wrong with you?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Nothing's wrong with me. Uh-

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, I'm glad that's over with. We'd better go back to the house now to see how Chris is doing.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dairy Gold Milk Company, day. An official leads the Thompsons through the factory. Cows are lined up in their stalls eating from personal troughs.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Uh Mr. and Mrs. Thompson, as President of the South Park Milk Company, I want to apologize personally for printing that falsified picture on our milk cartons.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Please, please. It's not your fault.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Ye-yes, but here at South Park Milk we strive for excellence. For instance, we are now entering the extraction room. As you can see, we keep it close to the refrigeration room. That way we can get the milk to the container as fast as possible.  That's why some say South Park milk tastes like you're suckin' it right from the cow's tits yourself.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Amazing.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Here, try a glass of our cold Vitamin D. And our fresh scones.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Delicious.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, excuse me. A little... difficult to drink with our condition.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Martha and I actually have buttocks where our heads should be.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Really? Well. And in here we have our Missing Child Resource Center.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh my, isn't this impressive?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes. With the Kelrom 4000, Mrs. Garthunk can search a database of over 30 million missing child cases.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: We'll start the computer on a data search. Now, when did your son turn up missing?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, it was 1982. Tommy was only six at the time.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Alright then. Computer...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Workiiing.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Run a scan of missing children since 1982. Check for physical birth defects called TPS.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: TPS. Torsonic Polarity Syndrome. Child missing since 1982. Workiiing.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: So you actually haven't seen your son in over 20 years?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: That's right.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: But then, why did you think the picture of Kenny was him. Wouldn't your son be much older now?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes, but since he appeared to be at least eight in the photo,  we assumed someone had seen him since we did.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: This is the only photo we have of our little Tommy.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: It's gonna take quite a while for the computer to do a scan of all missing kids.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, why don't we let Mrs. Garthunk do her work, and I'll take you two out for some good old Colorado chili.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: We don't really like chili; it makes us throw up.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Cartman's house, living room, day. The door bell rings and Eric answers it. Jimmy stands at the entrance

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, hello, Eric. I was really glad you called me, very much.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Jimmy! Thank God! Get in here!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: What's this all about?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Jimmy, you've always been my favorite standup comic. You've gotta help me. I've lost my sense of humor.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Gee, that's a terrible thing, Eric. Um comedy can be the best therapy, very much.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: I just have to find my funny bone again! Just try and make me laugh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, I don't think that'll be hard. I've been working on my rr... routine.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, let me have it.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay. Try this one on for size: Why did the... pigeon cross the road?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay, why?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Because it was having sex with the chihi... Because it was having sex with the ch-hi-hi... Because it was having sex with the ch-ch-ch-ch-ch-ch-ch... eh, it was having sex with the ch-ch-hiicken.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT

text: Scan for any children reported found in the Dallas-Ft. Wroth area, with a facial deformity.

text: Scan databanks for children who reported their parents missing.

text: Sidewalk, day. Six boys walk down the street again, only Kenny has replaced Tweek among the boys. They stop at Butters' house again,and again, Kyle calls out.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Butters! Hey Butters!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hehyeah?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: They found the butt-face people's son, Butters. They're gonna have a big reunion at the milk company!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Aw gee, thah-at sounds swell, fellas, but I can't go 'cause I'm still havin' behavioral problems.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Why are you wearing a paper bag on your head?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Uh, my parents are makin' me wear this paper bag until I learn... to stop makin' silly faces all the time. They've really had it up to  here with me.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Butters? Are you ready to stop with the stupid faces?

text: I sure am, Dad!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Alright, you can take the paper bag off.

text: Thanks, Dad! Ah I'm sorry I was bad-

text: Oh, very funny, young man! You think it's clever to make yourself up like a girl?!

text: Hububut Dad, ah I didn't lick a-

text: Did you use your mother's makeup?! She's gonna be furious!

text: Put that bag back on!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yes, sir.

text: Dude, that poor kid.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yeah, we gotta remember to kick his ass tomorrow.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Cartman's room, day. Cartman sits on his bed dejected. He's unwrapped a box and a gun sits on his bed to his left, a notepad and pencil to his right. He picks up the pad and pencil and writes...

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dear Mom:

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
role: I can no longer stand to be without a sense of humor. Without
text: laughter, the world is a cold and sad place, and I can't go out to face it anymore. Please tell everyone why I won't be at school.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: He sets the notepad down and looks at it for a moment, then he reaches over for the gun. He opens his mouth and puts the barrel of the gun in... and bites it off. It's a chocolate gun, and he sets the remainder down on the bed again.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
role: And please buy me more chocolate guns. I'm starting to run out.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: He picks up the chocolate again and takes another bite. Then he looks at the box the gun came in

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
role: Please get the kind with marshmallow inside. I don't like the
text: peanut-butter filled one.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dairy Gold Milk Company, day. A TV 4 news van and crew are present. Some of the factory workers are present in the background as the president of the company stands behind some microphones. The Thompsons stand next to the preisdent. A sign behind them asks, "Got Missing Kids?"

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: And so it is with great pride that we have flown little Billy Thompson out here, to be reunited with his parents for the first time in twenty years. Mrs. Garthunk?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Thank you, Mr. President. I'm proud to be an employee of South Park Milk, which to date has found over a hundred thousand missing kids, and, led the way in the fight against curdling. Mr. and Mrs. Thompson, your son grew up not knowing who his parents were.  But he was strong and resilient,  and ended up becoming very successful. I think it will amaze you as it will all of us to learn that your son... is Ben Affleck!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Come around here, Ben!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Mom! Dad!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Son!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, son!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: What's goin' on?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dude, the ass-faces' son is Ben Affleck!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, our same ol' Ben!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, I'm so happy!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Wow, I never realized Ben had TPS, but I definitely see the resemblance now.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Aw, son.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Isn't this wonderful?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Okay gang, give me a big smile.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well, looks like everything turned out alright for them.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yeah, I guess now we'll have to call him Ben Assfleck.  Ben Assfleck, say that's funny.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hey, you're laughng, Cartman.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Hehey, you're right! Oho, this is great! Ben Assfleck!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Well wait a minute. Don't you see what happened?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: A-heh, what?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Everything turned out okay for those people. And so now you can laugh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Huh?

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: When Cartman first opened the door, and saw the Thompsons, he felt bad for playing a joke on them. Now that everything's turnd out alright, he's able to laugh.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Oh, you're right. Cartman had a feeling of remorse.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: E-heh. No no no, I blew a funny fuse.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: There is no such thing as a funny fuse, Cartman. You felt bad.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Whatever. All I know is that I can laugh again. I'm gonna go home and eat another chocolate gun. Come on, Kenny!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Dangit!

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Stan and Kyle face Cartman. Behind them the crowd consists of only the camera crew, Mrs. Garthunk, Ben Affleck and the Thompsons, and the workers

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Wow, Cartman actually felt bad for somebody and couldn't laugh at them.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Our little man is growing up, Stan. He's growing up.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Yeah, I guess we all are. Maybe things are finally gonna start getting a more sophisticated around here.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Close-up of the Thompsons taking turns kissing Ben Affleck. Mrs. Thompson sobs and blows her nose.

title: HOW TO EAT WITH YOUR BUTT
text: Aw son!
